modName: Mike Valor - Follower from late Dawn Era
summary: Epic Companion who met Tiber Septim himself and now he wants to befriend the new Dragonborn!
descriptionHtml:
[b]This mod adds a very decent follower named Mike Valor. He has been around since the end of the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Lore:Dawn_Era]Dawn Era[/url], when mortals were created, but he has achieved immortality by making offerings to daedric princes and the divines. He was friends with [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Ysgramor]Ysgramor[/url] and helped him lead the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Five_Hundred_Companions]Five Hundred Companions[/url]. He was also friends with the iconic [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Tiber_Septim]Tiber Septim[/url], teaching him how to shout and use his dragonborn abilities. Mike loved dragons and dovahkiin, he befriended every dragonborn after Tiber Septim, and now hes here to met you and help you achieve greatness. 

Mike is best with one handed weapons and light armor. He also can use the Fire Breath(It was a gift from Tiber). He has great blocking skills and is an expert at sneaking. He has 450 Health, 250 Magika, and a whooping 750 stamina.[/b]

[color=red][b][u]*Look Forward Too*[/color][/b][/u]
More shouts
Custom dialogue
Custom voice
Custom equipment
Ancient spells
Female Version of Mike name Michelle

Note: Sometimes he does not show up in the game, if you want him to appear, go to the console command menu and type in help mike 4, then type in player.placeatme <Mike\'s ID> 1
That should work, screenshots soon!

Also I need someone to take screenshots for me and if you would like to help me just send me a message of what you\'re going to add/modify and I will come to a decision!
author: photos
